# Workflow Templates

## Provided Templates
The workflows in this template repository are intended to be included in all repositories and modified as needed.


## Additional Templates
Additional templates can be found managed in other repositories.<br/>
This avoids clutter in this repository of potentially unnecessary templates and allows for the selective addition as necessary.

#### Other Templates:
- [gh-actions](https://github.com/bitwarden/gh-actions/blob/main/templates)
